Text: Mapping Data Sharing Cc has been passed my supervisor said yes if contracts will allow it lets share data Next step is to have contracts reviewed by our legal to see if OK with vendors I am now walking the PIDwights contract to our counsel for an opinion on this issue The other Tobin data was purchased by our John Handley who is out today Upon his return Ill get with him to explore our options

Mapping Data Sharing Cc just hit our first bump in the road It appears that Enron no longer holds a controlling interest in EOTT which means that we cannot share the data under our current data vendors agreements Not to worry though I havent given up yet We have a few other paths we can go down that we are now in the process of investigating on this end so dont count us out yet Ill alert you as soon as we have something to report Forwarded by Robert CrockettHOUECT on PM Robert Crockett AM To cc Robert CT John CT Barbara CT Gerald CT Subject Mapping Data Sharing First hurdle has been passed my supervisor said yes if contracts will allow it lets share data Next step is to have contracts reviewed by our legal to see if OK with vendors I am now walking the PIDwights contract to our counsel for an opinion on this issue The other Tobin data was purchased by our John Handley who is out today Upon his return Ill get with him to explore our options
